Sentencas: Oxalate coprecipitation method was applied to prepare rare earth-doped ceria powders with a composition of Ceo.8R0.2O1-9 (R=Sm, La).
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: The precipitate produced was decomposed at 600 degrees C in air to the oxide solid solution.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: After milling with alpha-alumina ball, the powders were densified to 98-99% calculated density at 1600 degrees C.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: No influence of doped rare earth element on the thermal expansion coefficient of CeO2 was measured (11.4 x 10(-6)-11.8 x 10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: The Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 formed by colloidal processing and with 86-98% relative density offered 53-81 MPa of four-point flexural strength and 9.1 of Weibull modulus.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: Large flaws of 200-300 mu m sizes produced near surface were fracture origins.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: The Young's modulus and Vicker's hardness were also measured for Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics

Sentencas: These measured thermal and mechanical data were compared with those of component materials of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Thermal and mechanical properties of rare earth-doped ceria ceramics
